caseStudies.title: TechFlow: 340% ROAS in 30 Days
caseStudies.description: B2B SaaS company achieved massive growth through strategic creator partnerships.
caseStudies.challenge: TechFlow struggled to reach decision-makers in enterprise companies despite having a solid product.
caseStudies.approach: We identified micro-influencers in the B2B space and created authentic case study content.
caseStudies.results: 340% ROAS, 15,000 new qualified leads, $2.4M in attributed revenue
caseStudies.testimonial: Viral Foundry transformed our approach to B2B marketing. The results speak for themselves.

faqs.question: How do you select creators for our campaigns?
faqs.answer: We use our proprietary AI toolstack to analyze audience overlap, engagement quality, and brand fit. Every creator is vetted for authenticity and alignment with your target market.

faqs.question: What's your typical campaign timeline?
faqs.answer: We launch initial creator partnerships within 14 days. Full campaigns typically run for 30-90 days depending on objectives and scale.

faqs.question: Do you guarantee results?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee virality, we do guarantee transparent reporting and data-driven optimization. Most clients see positive ROI within the first 30 days.

faqs.question: How do you handle FTC compliance?
faqs.answer: All partnerships are properly disclosed according to platform guidelines and FTC requirements. We provide compliance training to all creators in our network.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing creators?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can audit and optimize your current creator relationships while expanding your network with new strategic partnerships.

faqs.question: What industries do you work with?
faqs.answer: We work across most industries including B2B SaaS, e-commerce, health & wellness, fintech, and consumer brands. Each campaign is tailored to industry-specific best practices.
